document.full_text: citigroup  has agreed to sell a portfolio of private equity assets to axa private equity  for $1.7 billion, the french insurer said on wednesday, the latest move by the u.s. bank to unload non-core assets.
document.title: citigroup sells private equity assets to axa unit
lines_and_colors: citigroup  has agreed to sell a portfolio of private equity assets to axa private equity  for $1.7 billion, the french insurer said on wednesday, the latest move by the u.s. bank to unload non-core assets.
